div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_animated et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.p: Our mission is to provide young men and women with a solid educational foundation in a context of care and concern.

Park View Middle School combines a challenging curriculum with clear moral direction. Instruction is marked by the seamless integration of technology and a dedication to the mental, physical, and moral development of all students.

Students will receive a quality education, sensitive to their learning styles and designed to equip them with the skills and core knowledge upon which further learning must be based. Park View’s curriculum is founded firmly on the fundamental tradition that values the refinement of thought and fortification of character that charges individuals with the responsibility to the common good and a global perspective of the world and their places in it.

div.p: Park View Middle School is committed to providing a rigorous and relevant education to its students.

Our goal is to prepare students for a college-preparatory secondary education, as well as develop life-long learners. We teach students how to become responsible, useful members of their communities. Education at Park View focuses on the development of skills that will be relevant to their everyday life, as well as applicable to their continued education. Within each content area, the School will comply with the No Child Left Behind requirements. Park View also teaches Common Core Standards in order to prepare their students for the future of education.
Park View Middle School is committed to providing a rigorous and relevant education to its students.

Our goal is to prepare students for a college-preparatory secondary education, as well as develop life-long learners. We teach students how to become responsible, useful members of their communities. Education at Park View focuses on the development of skills that will be relevant to their everyday life, as well as applicable to their continued education. Within each content area, the School will comply with the No Child Left Behind requirements. Park View also teaches Common Core Standards in order to prepare their students for the future of education.
Educational trips encourage learning! Our 7th Grade Grand Canyon trip and 8th Grade Catalina trip are some of the fun options available to our students.
A hands-on learning environment helps to stimulate our students’ learning experience.
Engaged Athletically, Engaged Academically!
Team sports can be the single most motivating factor for students.

Depending on weather conditions, road conditions, or other emergency situations, a decision will be made regarding school closure or 2-hour delay.

Park View Middle School is concerned with the safety of all our families and faculty, and a decision will be made early in the morning and after careful consideration. We will typically follow HUSD, but please check our web-site and listen to the stations below for information.
KPPV 106.7 FM KQNA 1130 AM
KYCA 1490 AM KAHM 101.7 FM
KGCB 90.9
